author: cms-l1t-offline
body: This fixes a bug when running Fast Simulation in postLS1 scenario, where new L1T emulation was not run but inputs were expected downstream. This bug fix causes new L1T emulation to be run in all scenarios where legacy GCT emulation was run, if postLS1 customization is made. It also sets the l1extra producer to use simulated or unpacked digis based on context.
title: L1t run l1t famos bugfix 730
